name: GhostSitter
description:
Ever been a teenager in need of quick money?

The obvious choice here is baby sitting. 

But you didn't expect the baby to be a ghost. And why is the Mom handing you a shotgun?

In this totally unrealistic babysitter simulator you are tasked with shooting spooky enemies, collecting candies and keeping a ghost baby well fed - all for a lousy pay.

Good luck!
